title: Jambo Means Hello: Swahili Alphabet Book
description: A companion to the Caldecott Honor Book  Moja Means One: Swahili Counting Book  Jambo Means Hello  introduces children to the Swahili alphabet with helpful pronunciation keys, while presenting East African culture and lifestyles through an easy-to-understand narrative and vivid illustrations.  A Caldecott Honor Book* “A lyrical song of Swahili life.”— School Library Journal, starred review
author: Muriel L. Feelings
